00012 #include "Format.h"

00014 namespace Util
00015 {
00016 
00017    // Default constructor.
00018    Bool::Bool()
00019     : value_(0),
00020       width_(Format::defaultWidth())
00021    {}
00022 
00023    // Constructor, value only.
00024    Bool::Bool(bool value)
00025     : value_(value),
00026       width_(Format::defaultWidth())
00027    {}
00028 
00030    Bool::Bool(bool value, int width)
00031     : value_(value),
00032       width_(width)
00033    {}
00034 
00035    void Bool::setValue(bool value)
00036    {  value_ = value; }
00037 
00038    void Bool::setWidth(int width)
00039    { width_ = width; }
00040 
00041    bool Bool::value()
00042    { return value_; }
00043 
00044    int Bool::width()
00045    { return width_; }
00046 
00047    /*
00048    * Input stream extractor for an Bool object.
00049    */
00050    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, Bool &object)
00051    {
00052       in >> object.value_;
00053       return in;
00054    }
00055 
00056    /*
00057    * Output stream inserter for an Bool object.
00058    */
00059    std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const Bool &object)
00060    {
00061       out.width(object.width_);
00062       out << object.value_;
00063       return out;
00064    }
00065 
00066 }
